医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
癫痫药物可以缓解与骨关节炎相关的关节退化《自然》杂志上的一项新研究将 Nav1.7 描述为软骨细胞中的关键调节分子，并报道了 Nav1.7 阻断在减轻疼痛和减缓 OA 进展方面的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Epilepsy-drug-may-alleviate-joint-degenesis-linked-with-osteoarthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Epilepsy-drug-may-alleviate-joint-degenesis-linked-with-osteoarthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02456bde-5cb8-44ed-8da2-60e3680b6bce Fri, 05 Jan 2024 06:56:00 -0500 Epilepsy drug may alleviate joint degeneration associated with osteoarthritis
COVID-19 的看不见的影响：研究显示 32 个国家的家庭死亡人数激增COVID-19 期间和之前 32 个国家的死亡地点趋势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/COVID-19s-unseen-impact-study-reveals-surge-in-home-deaths-across-32-countries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/COVID-19s-unseen-impact-study-reveals-surge-in-home-deaths-across-32-countries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7731c9a1-2db8-4c79-b042-97a32bd6d542 Fri, 05 Jan 2024 06:07:00 -0500 COVID-19's unseen impact: study reveals surge in home deaths across 32 countries
释放饮食的力量：miRNA 如何影响健康和疾病膳食 microRNA (miRNA) 在健康和疾病中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Unlocking-the-power-of-diet-How-miRNAs-influence-health-and-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Unlocking-the-power-of-diet-How-miRNAs-influence-health-and-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=707ceddc-3ddb-486b-a653-a16318831f15 Fri, 05 Jan 2024 05:20:00 -0500 Unlocking the power of diet: How miRNAs influence health and disease
ATCC 宣布获得 BARDA 的新奖项，为 NextGen 项目提供集中存储和生物处理服务全球首屈一指的生物材料管理和标准组织 ATCC 今天宣布，生物医学高级研究与发展管理局 (BARDA) 授予其为期五年、价值 8700 万美元的奖项，该机构隶属于美国卫生和健康部战略准备和响应管理局。人类服务部，支持下一代医疗对策（MCM）的开发，以保护美国人免受冠状病毒等公共卫生安全威胁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/ATCC-announces-new-award-from-BARDA-to-provide-centralized-storage-and-bioprocessing-services-for-Project-NextGen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/ATCC-announces-new-award-from-BARDA-to-provide-centralized-storage-and-bioprocessing-services-for-Project-NextGen.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7345568d-315d-471f-baf6-07fdd667032e Fri, 05 Jan 2024 05:03:00 -0500
研究发现知识工作者饮食多样性与降低抑郁风险之间存在联系工作之外的饮食和久坐习惯与抑郁症状之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Study-finds-link- Between-diet-diversity-and-reduced-depression-risk-in-knowledge-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Study-finds-link- Between-diet-diversity-and-reduced-depression-risk-in-knowledge-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33e2f537-8b36-47e6-95ad-f867fecf9dc0 Fri, 05 Jan 2024 04:39:00 -0500 Study finds link between diet diversity and reduced depression risk in knowledge workers
新研究表明间歇性禁食可减少与肥胖相关的脑部炎症和认知能力下降间歇性禁食 (IF) 的长期有益效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/New-study-shows-intermittent-fasting-reduces-obesity-lated-brain-inflammation-and-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/New-study-shows-intermittent-fasting-reduces-obesity-lated-brain-inflammation-and-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a0dc011-8925-48c1-8fdd-13b99425c2f2 Fri, 05 Jan 2024 04:14:00 -0500 New study shows intermittent fasting reduces obesity-related brain inflammation and cognitive decline
YAP 和 TAZ 蛋白指导子宫内骨骼发育一对蛋白质 YAP 和 TAZ 已被确定为子宫内骨骼发育的导体，可以提供对遗传性疾病的深入了解，例如成骨不全症（通常称为“脆骨病”）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/YAP-and-TAZ- Proteins-guide-bone-development-in-the-womb.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/YAP-and-TAZ- Proteins-guide-bone-development-in-the-womb.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14a8e525-c55f-4d00-b5ac-d29ac4f0d9ab Thu, 04 Jan 2024 23:57:15 -0500 YAP and TAZ proteins guide bone development in the womb
研究：三分之二患有镰状细胞病的婴儿是生活在贫困地区的母亲所生似乎一开始就患有可能致残的遗传性血液病还不够，一项研究表明，几乎三分之二的患有镰状细胞病的婴儿都是生活在贫困地区的母亲所生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Study-Two-thirds-of-babies-with-sickle-cell-disease-are-born-to-mothers-living-in-disadvantages-areas。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Study-Two-thirds-of-babies-with-sickle-cell-disease-are-born-to-mothers-living-in-disadvantages-areas。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c492de2d-215c-4056-8ca9-ec23da010a29 Thu, 04 Jan 2024 23:39:08 -0500 Study: Two-thirds of babies with sickle cell disease are born to mothers living in disadvantaged areas
双相情感障碍比吸烟更能缩短寿命患有双相情感障碍（一种可能导致躁狂和抑郁情绪的严重精神疾病）会让生活变得更具挑战性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Bipolar-disorder-cuts-lives-short-more-than-smoking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Bipolar-disorder-cuts-lives-short-more-than-smoking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12d65e78-cdbc-460a-b31c-395034131a2e Thu, 04 Jan 2024 23:07:08 -0500 Bipolar disorder cuts lives short more than smoking
研究发现癫痫可能是导致儿童猝死的原因在一项旨在更好地了解幼儿突然、意外死亡（通常发生在睡眠期间）的研究中，研究人员发现短暂的癫痫发作并伴有肌肉抽搐是一个潜在原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Seizures-may-be-responsible-for-some-sudden-deaths-in-children-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240104/Seizures-may-be-responsible-for-some-sudden-deaths-in-children-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a33ca76e-4a3c-4cd9-b79c-f8024f422a35 Thu, 04 Jan 2024 22:47:46 -0500 Seizures may be responsible for some sudden deaths in children, study finds
